lead_paragraph: Italian officials demanded that its European partners help more with the migrants, who have been coming in huge numbers this year. Last year, Italy rescued some 170,000 migrants at sea.

headline.print_headline: Thousands Rescued Off Libya In 22 Operations in One Day
headline.main: Thousands Rescued Off Libya in 22 Operations in One Day
